name: Limbones (_crASHleigh.exe)
description:
You've sent your skeleton into the dungeon to do your bidding, collect enough souls to escape, can you make it to the end with all your pieces intact?

Controls

W/Up = Climb

A/Left = Left

D/Right = Right

Space = Jump

Esc = Pause

Credits

Ashleigh, Curtis, and David

Additional Credits

Slime Sounds by Zuzek06

Using a modified version of TaroDev's 2D Character Controller

Bones Font by Sophie Fraser

Built in Unity3D
